channel.title: Why cant people connect to my server?!?!?!
channel.description: i dont have a router, so people should be able to connect to my server right now. im on it now. my no-ip is opened too. i have no clue why it isnt working. plz help.

item.title: Why cant people connect to my server?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @titans38120 titans38120
item.description:
@titans38120 wrote:

but my modem model number isnt listed.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 23, 2008, 12:49:15 am[/size][hr]wait, it says my game is forwarded, but nobdy can connect.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 23, 2008, 01:07:27 am[/size][hr]need help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 23, 2008, 12:14:50 pm[/size][hr]plzz help!

item.title: Why cant people connect to my server?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Mosh_On Mosh_On
item.description:
@Mosh_On wrote:

still gotta portforward, even without a router. you gotta portforward your modem. go to www.portforward.com and find your modem. when it asks which game you are doing this for just click any of them, it doesnt matter.

Read full topic
